story.text: NEW YORK Jan 2 The following financial service industry appointments and moves were announced on Tuesday. To inform us of other job changes, please e-mail: moves@reuters.com DEUTSCHE BANK AG (DBKGn.DE) The German bank's Deutsche Bank Securities unit said on Monday that Peter Babej, previously with Lazard Ltd., (LAZ.N) has joined as head of insurance investment banking for the Americas. He will also chair Deutsche Bank's new Global Insurance Committee within financial institutions banking. BANK OF AMERICA CORP. (BAC.N) Chris Innes, global head of equity financial products at Bank of America Corp., and Pat Augustine, global head of structured products, have left Bank of America as part of a reorganization, a spokeswoman said on Tuesday.
story.title: moves - deutsche bank adds new investment banker
